revised_title: New Reptile Discoveries in the Elgin Sandstones
tldr: The author discusses the discoveries of various reptile fossils in the Elgin Sandstone and their significance in understanding the geological history of the region. They describe the process of examining and identifying these fossils, which were challenging due to their condition and the complex geological context. The discoveries contribute to the understanding of the age and composition of the Elgin Sandstone and its relation to other geological formations.
